com.tofik.coolexoplayer.exoplayer.cool

Interface CacheManager


  • public interface CacheManager
    CacheManager is a helper interface used by Container to manage the PlaybackInfo of CoolPlayers. For each CoolPlayer, CacheManager will ask for a unique key for its PlaybackInfo cache. Container uses a LinkedHashMap to implement the caching mechanism, so CacheManager must provide keys which are uniquely distinguished by Object.equals(Object).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CacheManager DEFAULT
      A built-in CacheManager that use the order as the unique key.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getKeyForOrder(int order)
      Get the unique key for the CoolPlayer of a specific order.
      java.lang.Integer getOrderForKey(java.lang.Object key)
      Get the order of a specific key value.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        static final CacheManager DEFAULT
        A built-in CacheManager that use the order as the unique key. Note that this is not data-changes-proof. Which means that after data change events, the map may need to be updated.

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyForOrder

        @Nullable
java.lang.Object getKeyForOrder(int order)
        Get the unique key for the CoolPlayer of a specific order. Note that this key must also be managed by RecyclerView.Adapter so that it prevents the uniqueness at data change events.
        Parameters:
        order - order of the CoolPlayer.
        Returns:
        the unique key of the CoolPlayer.

      • getOrderForKey

        @Nullable
java.lang.Integer getOrderForKey(@NonNull
                                            java.lang.Object key)
        Get the order of a specific key value. Returning a null order value here will tell Container to ignore this key's cache order.
        Parameters:
        key - the key value to lookup.
        Returns:
        the order of the CoolPlayer whose unique key value is key.
